page_title: Certificate III in Dental Assisting - Plan C3407
text: City CampusProvide effective oral hygiene instruction to patients with an oral health treatment plan (HLTDEN028)70DENT5887CCity Campus Students must complete all 8 core courses and 2 elective courses.
